text: Vastutah allahane apalya paigambarala, khare svapna dakhavile ki jara allahane icchile tara tumhi avasya santi-suraksapurvaka masjidee haramamadhye dakhala vhala, doke mundavita ani dokyace kesa kapavuna gheta agadi nirbhaya ho'una. To tya gosti janato, jya tumhi janata nahita, tevha tyane tumhala yapurvi eka nikataca vijaya pradana kela
